name: ADRD Vascular Risk Factors
content: Vascular risk factors for dementia: Hypertension, High blood pressure, Diabetes, Diabetes mellitus, Hyperglycemia, Hyperlipidemia, High cholesterol, Dyslipidemia, Atrial fibrillation, AFib, Stroke history, TIA, Transient ischemic attack, Coronary artery disease, CAD, Myocardial infarction, Heart attack, Smoking, Tobacco use, Obesity, Metabolic syndrome
